channel.title: Compiler keeps saying: Could not find the path specified. Press any key to close
channel.description:
Compiler keeps saying: Could not find the path specified. Press any key to close. Why is this can anyone tell me???
Before you post replys about dont post a new topic use the search bar i couldnt find any on the search bar!!
Please reply as to why this error is happening.
thanks.

item.title: Compiler keeps saying: Could not find the path specified. Press any key to close
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

right click your compiler, click edit, and it should have something like jdk_VERSION, edit the numbers to your version of
java development kit (JDK)

Thanks,
Denoria.

Any problems, post here.

Read full topic
item.source: Compiler keeps saying: Could not find the path specified. Press any key to close

item.title: Compiler keeps saying: Could not find the path specified. Press any key to close
item.dc:creator: @Gold_Light Gold Light
item.description:
@Gold_Light wrote:

Have you checked your environmental variables? did you make sure it was set to your version of jdk.

EDIT: oh wait this is client side lol sorry right click your compiler and click edit.

Read full topic
